alert_name: DNS Query to Malicious Payload Hosting Domain
description: Advanced DNS Security detected suspicious DNS query from workstation FIN-WKS-087 to cdn-legitimate-updates[.]com, newly registered domain (2025-05-09, 1 day old) hosting AdaptixC2 shellcode payloads. DNS analytics: (1) Domain registered via Namecheap with privacy protection, (2) Hosted on Cloudflare (104.21.78[.]134), (3) No legitimate web presence, (4) Query initiated by powershell.exe process, (5) Resolved immediately before HTTPS download of Base64-encoded shellcode. Threat intelligence shows domain matching AdaptixC2 infrastructure patterns: subdomain /payload/loader.txt serving encoded PowerShell payloads. Query timestamp 04:05 AM correlates with Quick Assist RMM session activity.
policy_description: DNS query to newly registered AdaptixC2 payload hosting domain
policy_recommendation: HIGH: Block cdn-legitimate-updates[.]com via DNS sinkholing, hunt for PowerShell processes querying this domain, enable inline DNS blocking for domains <7 days old
